name: Aaron
description: He fires music bullets at enemies. On Death: fires 5 music bullets.

name: Adam
description: He shoots enemies automatically.

name: Adam II
description: He fires double bullets at enemies automatically.

name: Adam III
description: He fires triple bullets at enemies automatically. On Death: fire 3 big bullets.

name: Alien Baby
description: He fires a heat-seeking bullet at enemies automatically.

name: Alien Baby X
description: He fires two heat-seeking bullets at enemies automatically.

name: Angry Teapot
description: Increase your rate of fire when he follows you. On Death: Temporarily greatly increase rate of fire

name: Batu
description: Full of confidence! He will actively attack the enemies who are close to you

name: Blue Brick
description: This little brick blocks enemies' bullets. On Death: you have a chance to get another Blue Brick.

name: Blue Doctor
description: He collects hearts and has a chance to give you shields. On Death: drop random shields.

name: Cactus Baby
description: She causes damage to anyone she touches.

name: Cactus Baby II
description: She causes damage to anyone she touches, and fires penetrating bullets randomly.

name: Cactus Baby III
description: She causes damage to anyone she touches, and fire more penetrating bullets randomly. On Death: fire a huge amount of penetrating bullets.

name: Eight-Ball
description: This little ball blocks enemies' bullets.

name: Fire Devil
description: He shoots a fireball at enemies.

name: Flame Devil
description: He shoots two fireballs at enemies. On Death: fire a huge amount of fireballs.

name: Flower
description: She fires split bullets at enemies automatically. On Death: damage all enemies in the room.

name: Ges
description: He fires a laser to attack enemies.

name: Ghost Baby
description: She fires penetrating bullets at enemies automatically. On Death: protects you from damage for a short time.

name: Grabber
description: He collects coins and has a chance to give you random pickups. On Death: drop random coins.

name: Happy Kendama
description: Increase your weapon's range when he follows you. On Death: temporarily greatly increase your weapon's range

name: Iron Windmill
description: This little windmill deals melee damage when it touches an enemy. On Death: you get 3 angry sprites.

name: Jack
description: He fires bullets in random directions.

name: Jack II
description: He fires a bomb in random direction.

name: Jack III
description: He throws a bomb in random directions. On Death: throw 5 bombs at once.

name: Karsa
description: A crazy girl who throws bombs above enemies.

name: Lethal Perfume
description: Increase your weapon damage when she follows you. On Death: temporarily greatly increase your weapon damage

name: Little Bear
description: He fires a bouncy bullet at enemies automatically.

name: Little Panda
description: He fires two bouncy bullets at enemies automatically.

name: Nod-8
description: He will fire a missile to track enemies

name: Peter
description: A playful kitty. He collects hearts and bring you moldy hearts. On Death: drop random number of hearts.

name: Rock
description: This strange rock can block enemies' bullets.

name: Sea Monster
description: This little monster damages enemies who touch it.

name: Shy Mushroom
description: Increase your jump height when he follows you. On Death: temporarily greatly increase your jump height

name: Snow Boy
description: He can throw a snowball which freezes enemies.

name: Snow Brother
description: He can throw two snowballs which freeze enemies. On Death: fire a huge amount of snowballs.

name: Tiny Mummy
description: He can block enemies' bullets, and may fire two bullets when attacked.

name: Tiny Mummy II
description: He can block enemies' bullets, and may fire four bullets when attacked. On Death: drop half a heart.

name: Tiny Mummy III
description: He can block enemies' bullets, and may fire eight bullets when attacked. On Death: drop a heart.

name: Vibrant Ball
description: This little ball can block all kinds of bullets, and will explode after taking a certain number of hits.  On Death: It will explode.

name: Wild Monkey
description: This little monkey can fire bullets at enemies.

name: Wukong
description: Monkey king is back! He can attack enemies with his legendary staff.

name: Yano
description: She throws a spear to attack enemies.

name: Zombie Sister
description: She shoots poison bullets at enemies. She splits into two zombie sisters after getting hurt.
